attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Please sign the petition to tell Mr Brown what "we" the British people feel about the ridiculous "stealth" tax, that is the new road tax charges -based on emissions.

I sign to confirm I am against the new charges and would like these reviewed or cancelled.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
